Posts.Content: First TC two weeks ago, but from Sunday I've had red, burning cheeks (on my face!). It looks as if I've tried to put on rouge with a trowel. I am presuming this is yet another joyous side effect, though it's been a while in making itself felt if that is the case.
Posts.Title: Red cheeks

Posts.Content: Thank you Ruby Rose- it may well be the sun. I went for a walk Sunday so probably got hit then
Posts.Title: Red cheeks
